divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 12:10 AM my nephew received a phone call from one of his friends to go outside and look at the sky, to which he did, a few seconds later he comes running in the house yelling for us to go outside (we were having a new years party) we followed him and sure enough we (including myself) observed 4 glowing orbs, which at first it appeared to be one of those paper balloons with the candle in them, but they were too bright, also one of them sort of hoovered for a second or two them ascended a few feet and proceeded to follow the others, going from northwest to southeast, I ran in the house to grab my camera, but by the time I got back outside the last one of the orbs was getting behind a building and I lost view. In total there were 11, 6 that my nephew saw traveling in formation, 4 that I saw, and one more after I went back outside. I just wish I had my camera ready.
